column1: The Pit Room////Once you exit your car in the parking lot and walk to the building
column2: you can already smell the great fresh BBQ smoked smell. We were quickly greeted by the friendly staff upon arrival
column3: the menu is posted up on the wall or you can grab a menu while waiting in line. I ended up ordering the Pork sausage (jalapeno cheddar) and had mustard potato salad and mac Â n cheese for my sides.
